employee.helper: Exempt from CASS for income below {{threshold}} minimum wages

pensioner.label: I am a pensioner
pensioner.helper: Exempt from CAS; exempt from CASS for income below {{threshold}} minimum wages

scenarios.title: Planning Scenarios
scenarios.description: Save and compare different income configurations for better planning. Ideal for seeing the tax impact of different income or expense levels.
scenarios.maxScenariosNote: Maximum {{count}} scenarios. The oldest will be automatically deleted.

emptyState.title: No saved scenarios yet
emptyState.description: Save the current configuration to compare it later.

taxableIncome.label: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.tooltip: Tax calculation base (net income - CAS - CASS)

totalTaxes.label: Total Taxes and Contributions
totalTaxes.tooltip: Total amount paid to the state

netAfterTaxes.label: Available Income
netAfterTaxes.tooltip: Available income after all taxes and contributions

effectiveTaxRate.label: Effective Tax Rate
effectiveTaxRate.tooltip: Total percentage of gross income paid as taxes

note.text: For income below 6 minimum wages ({{amount}}), a minimum CASS of {{cassMin}} applies, which may increase the effective tax rate at lower incomes.

exchangeRates.title: Exchange Rates
exchangeRates.ecbTitle: European Central Bank - Euro foreign exchange reference rates

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.resetTooltip: Reset all values to default settings for the selected year

cass.title: CASS Configuration (Health Insurance Contribution)
cass.description: Minimum threshold for non-employees/non-pensioners, maximum cap for everyone
cass.minThreshold: Minimum threshold (for non-employees below this level)
